values: The Bondage of the Will, the Sovereignty of Grace, and the Glory of GodThe Bondage of the Will, the Sovereignty of Grace, and the Glory of God

For Martin Luther, the issue of man’s bondage to sin, and moral inability to believe or obey, was the root issue of the Reformation — and the lynchpin of Protestantism.For Martin Luther, the issue of man’s bondage to sin, and moral inability to believe or obey, was the root issue of the Reformation — and the lynchpin of Protestantism.
